name: Hero Runner 3D!
description:
Your mission in this running game is to become a strongman. On the craft epic race, you need to collect pieces of armor to build a perfect, awesome, and powerful armor skin. The more armor you get, the more strong you are.
How to play:
Choose the perfect heroes and face your biggest challenge
Collect the right parts and get your superpower!
Avoid the obstacles and zombies to survive.
When you get your superpower, swipe to attack
Features:
Unlock your next superhero outfit and transform yourself.
Various levels with many kinds of traps
Simple and smooth to control
